subject: Cross-Country Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall of the United States and Ola Vigen Hattestad of Norway won cross-country skiing World Cup sprint races Saturday in Düsseldorf, Germany.
snippet: Kikkan Randall of the United States and Ola Vigen Hattestad of Norway won cross-country skiing World Cup sprint races Saturday in Düsseldorf, Germany.
